sent.orig: Trypsin, the hydrdytic enzyme of insects, was crucial for digestion and toxicity of Cry protein.
sent.trans: Trypsin是昆虫体内存在的一种蛋白水解酶，它对Cry蛋白的作用结果关系到Cry蛋白毒性的发挥。

sent.orig: In this study, cry-type genes of Bt isolates screened from China were identified using PCR-RFLP method.
sent.trans: 本研究对国内不同来源的133株Bt菌株的cry基因进行了PCR-RFLP鉴定。

sent.orig: Compare cry, shout, yell and scream.
Compare cry (out), shout, yell and scream.
sent.trans: 试比较cry (out)、 shout、 yell、 scream的用法。

sent.orig: Compare cry, sob, weep, wail and whimper.
sent.trans: 试比较cry、 sob、 weep、 wail、 whimper这五个词。
